functions.%move.parameters.%moveProperti: The position in the window to move the group to. After moving, the first tab in the group is at this index. -1 moves the group to the end of the window.
The ID of the window to move the group to. If not specified, the group is left in its current window. Groups can only be moved to "normal" window types.
functions.%query.parameters.%queryInfo.p: The ID of the parent window, or windows.WINDOW_ID_CURRENT for the current window.
